column4: hi all - can someone help me troubleshoot my AgereSystems modem installation?
i followed the wiki instructions, and sl-modem-daemon sets up /dev/ttySl0, minicom allows me to send an atz command, but atdt <#> produces 'NO CARRIER'
Are you sure the modem is working properly?
i can't test it by dialing, but my experience w/ linux is if you can send an atz in minicom it should work.
